name: Science Portal
achievements: Built a full stack web application to centralize and simplify access to research outputs within Princess Margaret using a React + Typescript front-end, NestJS + Typescript REST API, MongoDB, Keycloak's OAuth2 for secure institution logins
Built a secondary Python REST API with FastAPI for managing on demand data scraping and an automated mailing system

Decreased the time it takes for researchers to get access to publication outputs by 90% through the development of an advanced data mining algorithm to seek out research outputs for publications at Princess Margaret

name: PMATCH (Prioritizer)
achievements: Built a real-time Python API utilizing the FastAPI framework, Keycloak service accounts for secure data access, and web sockets for instantaneous cross component communication with the goal of helping clinicians efficiently identify the most suitable clinical trials for their patients
Decreased the time it takes clinicians to parse clinical trials their patient is eligible for by 20% through developing an advanced ranking algorithm that utilizes patient molecular profiles

name: Team Website
achievements: Developed a full-stack web application to highlight our team's important publications, presentations, softwares, active members, and alumni
Built an automated web scraping script in Python for tracking current positions of alumni to keep profiles updated
Created an automated system using Google App Scripts to keep active team members updated on website as members join/leave

name: CoBE
achievements: Piloted an overhaul of the original application that included a new front-end that introduced Typescript and Tailwind, a REST API upgrade from Express.js + Javascript to NestJS + Typescript, MongoDB, Keycloak's OAuth2 for secure institution logins, SendGrid for platform email interactions
The revamp drove up usage by 25% and lead to the creation of 5 new pipelines, and dozens of new capsules

name: Aircheck
achievements: Led the full stack development and deployment of the Aircheck web application to share analysis ready chemical screening data for ML/AI workflows to aid in drug discovery using a React + Javscript front-end, Express.js + Javascript REST API, Firebase for secure logins, Firestore for the database, and GCP buckets for file storage

Collaborated with partners and users from Pfizer, Bristol Myers Squibb (BMS), X-chem, Hitgen, Structural Genomics Consortium (SGC), and University of North Carolina (UNC) to work on refining core components of the web application and building new ones based on user stories
